title: Complete FarmSmart App — Fix Dashboard, Quick Access, and Add Payment Method

requirements.text: Fix the farmer dashboard so that all feature sections are fully visible and scrollable. Ensure the dashboard grid (Soil Analysis, Crop Advisory, Marketplace, Our Store, Sell Crops, Buy from Farmers) renders completely without any content being hidden or cut off below the fold. Remove any layout constraints (overflow hidden, fixed height clipping) that prevent content from displaying.

quotes: for farmers i cant see anything below it

acceptanceCriteria: All six feature cards are visible on the dashboard without scrolling issues or clipping
Dashboard layout is fully scrollable and no section is hidden or cut off
Responsive on both mobile and desktop viewports

requirements.text: Fix the Quick Access / Quick Links section in the dashboard and footer so that all shortcut links render visibly and are functional. Ensure the quick-access shortcuts in the farmer dashboard and the footer's quick navigation links all appear with correct styling, icons, and active route links.
acceptanceCriteria: Quick access section on dashboard shows all shortcut links with icons and labels
Footer quick navigation links are all visible and navigate to the correct pages
Links are styled consistently with the app's nature-inspired theme

requirements.text: Implement a simulated payment method flow for purchases in both the In-App Store and the Seller Marketplace. When a farmer checks out, display a payment form that collects: cardholder name, card number (masked), expiry date, and CVV. On submission, simulate payment processing and show a success confirmation with order summary and estimated delivery window. Store the completed order (including payment confirmation status) in the backend per farmer.
acceptanceCriteria: A payment form modal/page appears at checkout in the In-App Store with card fields
A payment form modal/page appears at checkout in the Seller Marketplace
Form validates required fields (name, card number, expiry, CVV) before submission
On successful simulated payment, an order confirmation screen is shown with order ID, items, total, and estimated delivery window
Completed orders are saved to the backend and retrievable from the farmer's order history
Payment form is styled consistently with the app's earthy green/amber theme

requirements.text: Audit and complete the entire application to ensure every page and navigation link is accessible, fully functional, and visually consistent. All routes defined in App.tsx (auth, dashboard, soil analysis, crop advisory, marketplace, our store, sell crops, buy from farmers, seller product management, my crop listings) must render without errors. Navigation in the header and footer must link to all sections correctly.

quotes: all i need a complete website

acceptanceCriteria: All routes render their respective pages without blank screens or console errors
Header navigation links work for all sections
Footer quick links and farmer-specific links navigate to the correct pages
Authenticated-only pages redirect unauthenticated users to the login page
Overall visual consistency is maintained across all pages using the nature-inspired theme

constraints: Do not change the Internet Identity authentication mechanism
Do not introduce real payment processing — use simulated/mock payment only
Preserve all existing backend data models and query hooks
Do not edit files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui
nonGoals: Real credit card or third-party payment gateway integration (e.g., Stripe live mode)
New AI or analysis features beyond what already exists
Adding new product categories or backend data models beyond payment/order confirmation
